trans-unit.source: Represents a security token provider that handles security tokens for a SOAP message sender.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 SOAP 訊息寄件者的安全性權杖的安全性權杖提供者。

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityTokenProvider class when custom security tokens are required.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要自訂安全性權杖時，請使用 SecurityTokenProvider 類別。

trans-unit.source: The role of a security token provider is to get a security token when a SOAP message is sent by a client and a security token is used to authenticate the client or to protect the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖提供者的角色是由用戶端傳送 SOAP 訊息和安全性權杖用來驗證用戶端，或保護 SOAP 訊息時，取得安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method is called to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>呼叫方法來取得安全性權杖。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The security token provider can also be called to cancel and renew a security using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖提供者也可以呼叫來取消和更新安全性使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager> class implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenProvider%2A> method to determine which security token provider is required for a given security token.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>類別實作<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenProvider%2A>方法來判斷這個安全性權杖提供者，才能指定的安全性權杖。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenProvider%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> classes provide the default implementations for built-in security token types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>類別會提供預設的實作內建安全性權杖的型別。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>

trans-unit.source: For custom security token scenarios, you must derive a class from one of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> classes and provide the functionality to create the security token provider, security token authenticator, and security token serializer for the custom security token.
trans-unit.target: 自訂安全性權杖的情況下，您必須衍生類別，從其中一個<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>， <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>，或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>類別，並提供建立安全性權杖提供者、 安全性權杖驗證器和自訂安全性權杖的安全性權杖序列化程式的功能。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] creating a custom token, see [How to: Create a Custom Token](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]建立自訂權杖，請參閱[How to︰ 建立自訂權杖](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業，以便取消安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消，例如，已核發的安全性權杖可讓要求時它的方式取消安全性權杖的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定取消安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to cancel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>取消。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派會接收非同步關閉作業完成的通知。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的物件，由應用程式，其中包含與非同步關閉作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>參考非同步取消作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業，以便取消安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消，例如，已核發的安全性權杖可讓要求時它的方式取消安全性權杖的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定取消安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to cancel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>取消。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派會接收非同步關閉作業完成的通知。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的物件，由應用程式，其中包含與非同步關閉作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>參考非同步取消作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業，以便取得安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The BeginGetToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: BeginGetToken 方法呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定取得安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派會接收非同步關閉作業完成的通知。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的物件，由應用程式，其中包含與非同步關閉作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>參考非同步關閉作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業，以便取得安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>類別，您不需要覆寫非同步的方法中，做為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>基底類別會提供同步方法為基礎的非同步支援。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the BeginGetTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不需要覆寫 BeginGetTokenCore 方法，除非您必須提供您自己的非同步實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken%2A> method calls the BeginGetTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken%2A>方法會呼叫 BeginGetTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定取得安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派會接收非同步關閉作業完成的通知。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的物件，由應用程式，其中包含與非同步關閉作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，參考非同步作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation that renews a security token.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業的更新安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The BeginRenewToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: BeginRenewToken 方法呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that renews the security token.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定更新安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to renew.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>更新。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派會接收非同步關閉作業完成的通知。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的物件，由應用程式，其中包含與非同步關閉作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，參考非同步作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation that renews a security token.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業的更新安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>類別，您不需要覆寫非同步的方法中，做為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>基底類別會提供同步方法為基礎的非同步支援。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the BeginRenewTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不需要覆寫 BeginRenewTokenCore 方法，除非您必須提供您自己的非同步實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken%2A> method calls the BeginRenewTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken%2A>方法會呼叫 BeginRenewTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that renews the security token.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定更新安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to renew.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>更新。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派會接收非同步關閉作業完成的通知。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的物件，由應用程式，其中包含與非同步關閉作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，參考非同步作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Cancels a security token.
trans-unit.target: 取消安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消，例如，已核發的安全性權杖可讓要求時它的方式取消安全性權杖的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The CancelToken method calls <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: CancelToken 方法呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelTokenCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定取消安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to cancel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>取消。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a security token.
trans-unit.target: 取消安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消，例如，已核發的安全性權杖可讓要求時它的方式取消安全性權杖的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A> method calls CancelTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A>方法會呼叫 CancelTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the CancelTokenCore method is overridden and the security token passed into the token parameter cannot be canceled, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 當 CancelTokenCore 方法會覆寫，而且不能取消安全性權杖傳遞至權杖參數，會擲回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>例外狀況。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定取消安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to cancel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>取消。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步作業，以便取消安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消，例如，已核發的安全性權杖可讓要求時它的方式取消安全性權杖的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The EndCancelToken method calls <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: EndCancelToken 方法呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelTokenCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelToken*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>呼叫所傳回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelToken*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelToken*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步作業，以便取消安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消，例如，已核發的安全性權杖可讓要求時它的方式取消安全性權杖的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>類別，您不需要覆寫非同步的方法中，做為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>基底類別會提供同步方法為基礎的非同步支援。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the EndCancelTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不需要覆寫 EndCancelTokenCore 方法，除非您必須提供您自己的非同步實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelToken%2A> method calls EndCancelTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelToken%2A>方法會呼叫 EndCancelTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelTokenCore*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>呼叫所傳回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelTokenCore*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelTokenCore*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步作業，以便取得安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The EndGetToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: EndGetToken 方法呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetTokenCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>呼叫所傳回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>表示安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步作業，以便取得安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>類別，您不需要覆寫非同步的方法中，做為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>基底類別會提供同步方法為基礎的非同步支援。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the EndGetTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不需要覆寫 EndGetTokenCore 方法，除非您必須提供您自己的非同步實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetToken%2A> method calls the EndGetTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetToken%2A>方法會呼叫 EndGetTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>呼叫所傳回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>表示安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to renew a security token.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步作業，以便更新安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The EndRenewToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: EndRenewToken 方法呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewTokenCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>呼叫所傳回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is renewed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，表示已更新的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to renew the security token.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步作業，以便更新安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>類別，您不需要覆寫非同步的方法中，做為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>基底類別會提供同步方法為基礎的非同步支援。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the EndRenewTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不需要覆寫 EndRenewTokenCore 方法，除非您必須提供您自己的非同步實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewToken%2A> method calls the EndRenewTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewToken%2A>方法會呼叫 EndRenewTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>呼叫所傳回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is renewed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，表示已更新的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Gets a security token.
trans-unit.target: 取得安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The GetToken method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and a security token is required.
trans-unit.target: GetToken 方法會呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>類別時，用戶端傳送 SOAP 訊息且需要安全性權杖。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: The GetToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: GetToken 方法呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases the `timeout` parameter is not used by derived classes of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> such as <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下`timeout`參數不由<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>例如<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider></xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>的衍生類別

trans-unit.source: However, sometimes retrieving a security token involves distributed messaging.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有時擷取安全性權杖包含分散式訊息。

trans-unit.source: An example is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenProvider> used in a federated service.
trans-unit.target: 範例是<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenProvider>同盟服務中使用。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: In these cases the `timeout` parameter is used to avoid exceptions caused by network failures, message loss, and other error conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下`timeout`參數用來避免網路失敗、 訊息遺失或其他錯誤狀況所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定取得安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，代表要取得的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Gets a security token.
trans-unit.target: 取得安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: When the GetTokenCore method is overridden and the security token passed into the token parameter cannot be obtained, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 當 GetTokenCore 方法會覆寫，而且無法取得安全性權杖傳遞至權杖參數，會擲回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>例外狀況。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and a security token is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>類別時，用戶端傳送 SOAP 訊息且需要安全性權杖。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the GetTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>方法會呼叫 GetTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定取得安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，代表要取得的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Renews a security token.
trans-unit.target: 更新安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: An issued security token that is renewable allows a client to renew it when the security token is about to or has expired.
trans-unit.target: 可更新且已發出的安全性權杖可讓用戶端安全性權杖即將或已經過期時更新它。

trans-unit.source: The RenewToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RenewToken 方法呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewTokenCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that renews the security token.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定更新安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to renew.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>更新。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is renewed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，表示已更新的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Renews a security token.
trans-unit.target: 更新安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: An issued security token that is renewable allows a client to renew it when the security token is about to or has expired.
trans-unit.target: 可更新且已發出的安全性權杖可讓用戶端安全性權杖即將或已經過期時更新它。

trans-unit.source: When the RenewTokenCore method is overridden and the security token passed into the token parameter cannot be renewed, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 當 RenewTokenCore 方法會覆寫，而且無法更新傳遞至權杖參數的安全性權杖，會擲回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>例外狀況。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A> method calls the RenewTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A>方法會呼叫 RenewTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that renews the security token.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定更新安全性權杖之訊息的逾時值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to renew.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref>更新。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is renewed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，表示已更新的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the security token can be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以取消安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消，例如，已核發的安全性權杖可讓要求時它的方式取消安全性權杖的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the security token can be cancelled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以取消安全性權杖。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the security token is renewable.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以更新安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: An issued security token that is renewable allows a client to renew it when the security token is about to or has expired.
trans-unit.target: 可更新且已發出的安全性權杖可讓用戶端安全性權杖即將或已經過期時更新它。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the security token can be renewed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以更新安全性權杖。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
